verse:
दिव्यो ह्यमूर्तः पुरुषः स बाह्याभ्यन्तरो ह्यजः।
अप्राणो ह्यमनाः शुभ्रो ह्यक्षरात्‌ परतः परः ॥
meaning: Meaning:The Supreme Being is indeed divine, formless, and unborn. It is both within and outside everything. It is devoid of life force and mind. It is pure and beyond the syllables. It is transcendent and supreme.
